tha-ap383:0.3_0: Remember the leaning against the senior monks,
tha-ap383:1.2_0: aspiring to the level of the bad.
tha-ap383:1.4_0: I keeping the best of cattle.
tha-ap383:2.1_0: I see a fruit of good deeds,
tha-ap383:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap383:3.4_0: and the fruit of good and results.
tha-ap383:4.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
tha-ap383:4.2_0: rebirth into all states of existence is eradicated,
tha-ap383:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap383:6.2_0: and skeleton without flesh or blood,
tha-ap383:6.3_0: I have realized the six kinds of direct knowledge,
tha-ap383:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Dhaniya.
tha-ap383:8.1_0: first part of the senior monks who had leftovers from the load of the fruit.
